data.title: Gina Torres
data.meta_description: Gina Torres. Actress: Serenity: Flucht in neue Welten. Gina was born in New York City and is youngest of three children in a close-knit Cuban American family. Attended New York City's High School of Music and Art She is a gifted mezzo soprano and was trained in opera and jazz and also sang in a gospel choir.
data.text:
You have Showtime, you have AMC, you have all of these, you know, incredible networks that are now bringing forth their product without the handcuffs, if you will, of trying to sell soap to the entire country.

I certainly came up in an era where women were really making strides and making a point to beat down doors and find their place and crash through the glass ceiling.

When it was announced that I was going to be on "Castle" (2009), there were immediate messages on all the TV news sites from "Firefly" (2002) fans hoping for a nod to the series--some encrypted business just for them! I can't promise that, but I can say that a few people out there might get a thrill.
